text: Alexander Acosta, the only Hispanic member of President Trump’s Cabinet, said he had submitted his resignation to take effect in a week. He is stepping down amid scrutiny of his role as U.S. attorney in a deal that allowed Epstein to plead guilty to lesser offenses in a sex-crimes case.
